messages.subject: Tokugawa Yorinobu
messages.msgSnippet: Okay scholars...does anyone have a reference that illustrates a picture of Iyeyasu s 8th son, Yorinobu who ruled Kii province ca. mid-1600s? If so, is it
messages.messageBody:
Okay scholars...does anyone have a reference that illustrates a picture of Iyeyasu's 8th son, Yorinobu who ruled Kii province ca. mid-1600s? If so, is it possible to get a scan of the illustration from you or if not that, let me know where the illustration can be found. (Unfortunately, little reference on such things here in St. Louis other than my own library!)

danke all,

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
